item.name: Sword of 10,000 Cuts
entries: Passed from swordmaster to apprentice for hundreds of years, this gleaming silver blade has been spoken in countless legends. You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with tihs magic weapon.

entries.name: Way of the Sword
entries: As an action, choose a creature within 5 feet of you, roll {@dice 1d100} and add your level. The target takes slashing damage equal to the total.

entries.name: Royal Dragon, Hidden Blade
entries: You can draw or sheathe this weapon at any time during your turn (no action required).

entries.name: Swordsman's Shame
entries: When you make an opportunity attack with this weapon, the attack deals maximum damage.
